text: What if we Lived on Mercury?
But wait. Will I get Pasta on Mercury?
Firstly, if we Lived on Mercury.
It is the smallest planet in our Solar System,  we may have to live in extremely tiny homes.
Secondly, if we Lived on Mercury.
It is the most cratered planet in our Solar System, we may have to live inside one.
Thirdly, if we Lived on Mercury.
It is the 2nd hottest planet in our Solar  System, we may start sweating buckets.
Fourthly, if we Lived on Mercury. 1 year on Mercury is only 88 days long.
Some people may even celebrate  their 400th birthday.
Fifthly, if we Lived on  Mercury, Mercury has no Moon.
We may need to purchase a  ton of artificial lights.
Lastly, if we Lived on Mercury. Sun appears almost 3 times bigger on Mercury.
Sale of sunscreen lotions might skyrocket.
